input.prompt:
Implement Phase 7: Edge Cases and Polish

GOAL:  Handle edge cases for long text, special characters, many tasks, and ensure responsive behavior

TASKS:
- Ensure long task text wraps without breaking layout (word-break, overflow-wrap)
- Verify HTML special characters display as text (not rendered as HTML) - use textContent not innerHTML
- Verify emojis display correctly in task text
- Test with 100+ tasks to ensure scrolling works and performance is acceptable
- Add overflow-y auto or scroll to task list container if needed
- Verify minimum 320px width works on mobile
- Ensure all interactive elements are at least 44px tap target
- Add visible focus indicators (outline or ring) on all focusable elements
- Test Tab navigation through input, Add button, checkboxes, delete buttons

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA:
- Long task text wraps to multiple lines without overflow
- HTML characters like `<script>` display as literal text
- Emojis display correctly in tasks
- List scrolls when tasks exceed view...
